sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { PictureDetailsComponent } from '../picture-details/picture-details.component'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/api.service'; import { IPicture } from 'src/app/shared/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-picture', templateUrl: './edit-picture.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-picture.component.css'] }) export class EditPictureComponent implements OnInit{ myPicture: any; picForEditForm: IPicture | undefined; constructor(private router: Router, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute, private pictureDetailsComponent: PictureDetailsComponent, private apiService: ApiService) {} // cancel(): void { // this.router.navigate(["/auth/profile"]); // } ngOnInit(): void { const id: string = this.activatedRoute.snapshot.params['picId']; // this.myPicture = this.pictureDetailsComponent.myCurrPicture; // console.log(this.myPicture); const url = this.router.routerState.snapshot.url; let regExp = /(\/[a-zA-Z]*)(\/[a-zA-Z]*\/)([a-zA-Z]*)/gm const result: any = regExp.exec(url); this.apiService.getPictureToBeEdit(result[3], id) .subscribe({ next: (pic) => { this.picForEditForm = pic; }, error: (err) => { console.log(`Error: ${err} `); } }) } }

Edit Picture

Picture name is required.

Picture name must be at least {{nameInput.errors?.['minlength']['requiredLength']}} characters long.

Materials is required.

Materials must be at least {{materialsInput.errors?.['minlength']['requiredLength']}} characters long.

Image is required.

Price is required.

Price must be at least {{priceInput.errors?.['minlength']['requiredLength']}} characters long.

The field with your description is required.

Description must be at least {{descriptionInput.errors?.['minlength']['requiredLength']}} characters long.
